about_the_game:
Hello,

Welcome to Flowence! It is the first social game to reasonably utilize AI technology. We hope you can release the pressure of life and find inner peace while experiencing the following:



  1. Use this as a safe haven to anonymously send mails, share your feelings, or seek advice
  2. Anonymously reply to other players' mails
  3. AI will automatically translate mails for you to facilitate easier communication with players around the world
  4. Plan and organize your daily to-dos for a more orderly life
  5. Stay focused and boost your productivity with our built-in Pomodoro timer tool
  6. Enjoy the soothing music and immerse yourself in inner peace



Is there something that makes you feel down or stressed? Feeling low, like happiness, is a normal emotion, and expressing it might help. In Flowence, you can anonymously write about your worries, sadness, or happy moments, and you can also anonymously respond to other players' expressions. This is an online social space without followers, reposts, or subscriptions. Flowence allows players to care for each other through words, reduce loneliness, and be their true selves. Your few words can be very powerful. In Flowence, language is no longer a barrier; AI will translate mails for you, making the world smaller, broader, and more transparent.



Or sometimes you may want to forget about external matters and focus on work or study? In Flowence, we provide built-in to-do lists and Pomodoro tools to help you prioritize important tasks, stay focused, and improve efficiency. At the same time, we have carefully selected some music for you, so you can always immerse yourself in inner peace and get rid of external disturbances.



By the way, you can also collect stickers in Flowence and use them as small decorations in replies or use the 3D toys that come with the stickers to decorate your room.

- Glowing Genesis Studio

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes a message-in-a-bottle style anonymous social feature, allowing users to interact via text mails. The game itself does not contain any mature graphics or audio content. However, user-generated content may include some mature material.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: MacOS 11 (Big Sur) or latter
  • Processor: Apple Silicon (M1) or latter
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Silicon
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel CPU is no longer supported

  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Flowence is an anonymous online social space where players from around the world communicate with each other in a manner similar to a message in a bottle. Additionally, Flowence can help you stay focused, find inner peace, and be your true self.
